duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop internet-scale distributed system technologies such as Microservices, Solr, Kafka, Mem Cache, etc.
Explain complex subjects in layman's terms and drive the development of high-quality software systems.
Work with data scientists and product managers to improve customer experience and ad relevance.
Mentor and guide mid-to-junior engineers in solving complex software systems problems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or a related field (Master's preferred)
